title: New: Mood Indigo – Glimpse
content:
Boston’s Mood Indigo just gets better and better with every track he conjures up.

With his vocal production improving each time, and his beats becoming more unique allowing his music to develop a characteristic entirely of it’s own. Glimpse is quite possibly his finest outing to date, with spliced vocal samples and delirious synth sections, whilst remaining a true to it’s roots pop number. So it verges on the dreaded ‘chillwave’, but c’mon, it’s so much more than just that. Check out Glimpse below and grab a free download.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
